Take online courses: There are many free online courses available that can teach you how to use a computer, such as Codecademy, Khan Academy, and Coursera.
Practice regularly: The more you practice using a computer, the better you will become. Set aside time each day to practice and try out new things.
Use tutorials and guides: If you're having trouble with a particular aspect of using a computer, there are many tutorials and guides available online that can help you.
Seek help: Don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it. Reach out to friends or family members who are experienced with computers, or contact a local technology support center for assistance.
